description:
When is comes to affordable traveling, I believe the most interesting thing to figure out is how to LIVE for free and have unique experiences in almost any country in the world. That's where the fun begins!

By the end of this course you will know:

  • How to live in almost ANY country for free while helping local communities, projects and businesses.
  • How to be creative in your own way and be paid to do that
  • How to pursue your business idea and travel to exotic locations around the world to work on it while being fully sponsored
  • How to experience local culture in almost any country, live there for free, learn local languages and be useful to local communities

You will know all the necessary programs, platforms and principles.

And then it's up to you. You can easily spend few years living around the world for free if you decide to join all the programs that I'll show you.

Or you can have a gap year and join only 1 or 2 — it's up to you. But I can assure you that each of these programs can be potentially life changing.

There are special programs that will allow you to really explore the world, explore yourself and define a new way of life for yourself.

Enjoy the course. I am excited to share my story and all the learnings along the way. See you!

P.S. This a no-nonsense course. I cut it to be 45 min long to save your time and make you focus on what's important.

SUPPORT: You have a lifetime support for your travel questions — I'll be there for you to help out.

UPDATES: This course will be constantly updated with new ways of cheap and unconventional travel. Join our community of travel hackers here.
title: Travel + Creativity: 5 Ways Of Living Free Around The Globe
